lyric:
[00:00.76]
[00:15.19]At break of day
[00:16.58]In hope we rise
[00:18.46]We speak your name
[00:20.41]We lift our eyes
[00:22.15]Tune our hearts
[00:23.87]Into your beat
[00:25.72]Where we walk
[00:27.75]There you'll be
[00:29.69]With fire in our eyes
[00:31.16]Our lives a light
[00:33.07]Your love untamed
[00:34.90]It's blazing out
[00:36.74]The streets will glow
[00:38.37]Forever bright
[00:40.40]Your glory is breaking through the night
[00:44.41]You will never fade away
[00:46.44]Your love is here to stay
[00:48.01]By my side
[00:48.98]In my life
[00:49.63]Shining through me everyday
[00:51.51]You will never fade away
[00:53.15]Your love is here to stay
[00:54.93]By my side
[00:55.95]In my life
[00:56.78]Shining through me everyday
[01:00.07]
[01:13.82]You wake within me wake within me
[01:15.96]You're in my heart forever
